str2: Only, solitary, desolate. Probably from meno; remaining, i.e. Sole or single; by implication, mere.
Lucas, Luke, Christian physician and writer of the Third Gospel and Acts. Contracted from Latin Lucanus; Lucas, a Christian.

str2: To take up, raise; I pick up, take on board; I carry off, lead away. From ana and lambano; to take up.
